term.title: amidines

item.text: Derivatives of oxoacidsRnE(=O)OH in which the hydroxy group is replaced by an amino group and the oxo group is replaced by =NR. Amidines include carboxamidines, sulfinamidines and phosphinamidines, R2P(=NR)NR2. In organic chemistry an unspecified amidine is commonly a carboxamidine.
